roleset.name: to edit so as to block the truth
roleset.note: CENSOR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'censor' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from censor.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The most ruthless dictatorships have not censored their press more brutally than the drug mafias censor Colombia 's .
